name: Cozy Space
description:
Are home design software too professional? Is it too difficult to get started?

Why not give "Cozy Space" a try! Here, you'll find an extensive library of models, not only enabling you to create various styles of comfortable spaces but also specially designed for the gamer community, with features like large desks, gaming consoles, ambient lighting, and other cool accessories, allowing you to use your creativity to build your dream gaming room.

Enjoy listening to music when relaxing?
In "Cozy Space," there's a built-in multi-track audio system, where each audio track can be adjusted individually, letting you customize the most suitable music for your mood!

Don't feel like doing anything? Just want to chill?
"Cozy Space" is the perfect choice! Build your own cozy mini-house, and enjoy the cyber scenery with your little cat, watching the sunrise and sunset.
